long_description: Give yourself a boost when you need it most with PROBAR Bolt(TM) energy chews. Chews are loaded with electrolytes, B vitamins, antioxidants and complex carbohydrates for quick energy bursts. PROBAR Bolt energy chews are organic, gluten free, vegan, and dairy free. Raspberry and Berry Blast flavors contain 20mg of caffeine per serving from yerba mate. Each pouch of contains 10 energy chews. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Give yourself a boost when you need it most with PROBAR Bolt(TM) energy chews.
